    • Method Detail

      • forwardCheck

        public int forwardCheck(java.util.Stack<AuxiliarElement> futureObjects,
               Solution solution,
               CjtRestrictionsController cjtRestController)
        forwardCheck of all the precalculable restrictions
        Parameters:
        futureObjects - stack of all the objects that need to be added to the solution
        solution - partial solution of the algorithm
        cjtRestController - CjtRestrictionController
        Returns:
        int: 0 -> all valid 1 -> more mandatoryElements required than the futureObjects provided 2 -> futureObjects has restricted elements for the current room 3 -> futureObjects has missing elements required for the current room 4 -> futureObjects has incompatible elements 24 -> code 2 and code 4
